definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Tom—honest injun, now—is it fun, or earnest?
sentences.chinese: 湯姆，你是開玩笑，還是說真格的？

sentences.english: It is time to take it serious.
Talk is cheap! Show me what you got.
sentences.chinese: 光說沒用，給我點真格的看看。

sentences.english: Can you put the ball on the finger?
Is China Finally Getting Tough on Piracy?
sentences.chinese: 中國打擊盜版終於動真格了？

sentences.english: Our competitors are using tactics that indicate that they want to play hardball.
sentences.chinese: 我們的主要競爭對手所用的戰術表示他們要動真格了。

sentences.english: And just so you know how serious I am…
sentences.chinese: 正因爲如此，我要你們知道我動真格的了。

sentences.english: Indeed, I have been a complete ass, and I know it.
sentences.chinese: 說真格的，我是一隻十足的蠢驢，我心裏明白。

sentences.english: our competitors are using tactics that indicate that they want to play hardball.
sentences.chinese: 我們的競爭對手所用的戰術表明他們要動真格了。

sentences.english: Seriously, though, let's make a bet.
sentences.chinese: 不過說真格的，我們來打賭。

sentences.english: Every time I mentioned, as long as the real thing, he certainly did not agree.
sentences.chinese: 我每次提離婚，只要動真格，他肯定不同意。

sentences.english: Ladies and gentlemen, let's be serious here.
sentences.chinese: 女士們先生們，現在我們來真格的。

sentences.english: Now, they're banned. Like, for real.
sentences.chinese: 現在又給禁掉了，而且貌似是動真格的了。

sentences.english: They are shortly to realise that we mean business.
sentences.chinese: 他們很快將意識到我們是動真格的。

sentences.english: And you gotta do it for real this time, man, because I want her.
sentences.chinese: 這次你得動真格的爺們，因爲我想跟她好。

definition: ruthless/fierce/ferocious/determined/to harden (one's heart)/old variant of 很[hen3]
to fall head over heels/(fig.) to come a cropper
(coll.) to learn one's lesson/to have enough brains to learn from one's mistakes
real swords, real spears (idiom)/real weapons/very much for real/every bit real/the genuine article
to stand aside and do nothing (idiom)/to take no part in
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
to suffer/to suffer for one's actions/to pay dearly/to burn one's fingers
all talk and no action (idiom)/to preach what one does not practice/same as 光說不做|光说不做[guang1 shuo1 bu4 zuo4]
to exert all one's force/all-out effort/CL:股[gu3]
Chinese boxing/fist and feet/punching and kicking
